projects.name: Tenzies
projects.description: Get all matching dice in the least amount of rolls. Click a die to hold it. The orginal project's requirements were to create the game using a singular number (1-6) to represent the dice faces. I augmented it to use some Javascript to represent the faces as real dice with black pips.

projects.name: LED Scoreboard
projects.description: A responsive scoreboard. I built this twice, originally using only vanilla Javascript, then a second time using React. The original project's requirements were to create the scoreboard only using numbers. I augmented it to use an array of segments mimicking real LEDs. While I could have tried to figure out the CSS myself, I used ChatGPT to accelerate the process and adjusted the code it produced to integrate with my own.
